hymn.title: But we all with unveiled face

layout.singingstanza: But we all with un -- veiled face, be -- hold -- ing and re -- flect -- ing like a mir -- ror the glo -- ry of the Lord, are be -- ing trans -- formed in -- to the same im -- age from glo -- ry to glo -- ry, e -- ven as from the Lord Spir -- it; from glo -- ry to glo -- ry, e -- ven as from the Lord Spir -- it.

lyrics.stanza: But we all with unveiled face, Beholding and reflecting like a mirror The glory of the Lord, are being transformed Into the same image From glory to glory, Even as from the Lord Spirit. From glory to glory, Even as from the Lord Spirit.
